message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its incredible value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $1,400,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  Considering the true value and potential of this product, I'm willing to come down to $1,950,000. This offer reflects the significant value you'll gain from owning this product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,500,000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay.
